title: I'm 13 and just read Rich Dad Poor Dad, what other Robert Kiyosaki book would you recommend? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, well done! I am reading some of his books with my children. The second book by Robert Kiyosaki is Cashflow Quadrant which is also an excellent read! In addition, here is a list of books that are useful with respect to finance and capitalism which is the focus of his books! Which 12 books on Capitalism & Money would you read?

Robert Kiyosaki only shows one perspective on how to make money. You can learn how to make money from the framework he taught in his books. However, you need to know that millions of people have also read his books. In order for you to create an investment edge, you need to read many books to gain multiple perspectives. Hopefully, you can acquire useful skills and build them into your repertoire of knowledge. I write about generating passive incomes at my blog Living Free - a practical guide to building your passive income to live free. I’m reading/re-reading a list of Books in 2017 for personal growth.
